sourcesContent:
import { Button, Navbar, Container, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useState } from "react"; function Menu() { const [selectedTag, setSelectedTag] = useState("All"); // Sample menu items for each tag const menuItems = [ { id: 1, name: "Item 1", price: 10.99, tag: "All", description: "Description for Item 1", imgSrc: "/path/to/image1.jpg" }, { id: 2, name: "Item 2", price: 8.49, tag: "All", description: "Description for Item 2", imgSrc: "/path/to/image2.jpg" }, // Add more menu items here ]; // Filter menu items based on the selected tag const filteredMenuItems = selectedTag === "All" ? menuItems : menuItems.filter((item) => item.tag === selectedTag); return ( <>

Our Menu

{filteredMenuItems.map((item, index) => (

{item.name}

${item.price.toFixed(2)}

{item.description}

))} ); } export default Menu;
